reviews.review_msg: Elena is nice! come to her with whenever questions you have and she doesn't mind explaining it over and over. however, tbh, if I hadn't taken Calc in high school, I would have never understood what is going on! She is not a really good explainer. her grading is quite clear. her homework is long but you only need to submit few of the questions.

Extremely slow in class. Can't keep the class going for too long, seems like she needs more break than her students. Moreover, very less overall practise done in class but dose give a lot homework.  She gives way too much background information than required, most of the time not even related to math.
